title: Weds Post Show (09-15-21)
itunes:title: Weds Post Show (09-15-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Caroline Hobby about how she recently interviewed Jake Owen’s fiancé Erica. Bobby talks about the painting she gave them as a wedding gift. Bobby gives an update on his old Bronco that got wrecked. A TikToker reveals 5 things to not do on an airplane. Bobby also talks about why people say “we” when it comes to their favorite sports teams. We also talk to Scuba Steve about his job as a home inspector.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
